# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Hashes the payment error object by feeding the item into the given hasher.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hasher to use when combining the components of this instance.

## Discussion

Implement this method to conform to the [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/Hashable] protocol. The components for hashing must be the same as the compared components in your type’s `==` operator implementation. Call `hasher.combine(_:)` with each of these components.



## Hashing

- **hashValue**: The hash value for the payment error.
